title: Playing It Safe
description: Playing It Safe looks at ways children can stay safe while having fun. Each chapter includes a list of important and practical rules for staying safe on wheels, in the water, and on the playground. The familiar topics and easy-to-read text are supported by captioned photographs.
meta: community, dangerous, downhill, helmet, scooter, wrists
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge
Long Vowels : Recognize spellings for long /a/
Adverbs : Recognize, form, and use adverbs ending in -ly
Compound Words : Identify and form compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
